item.title: Tell him to stay in his tree
item.description: Today I found out that my dad was placed into the hospital to help him fight his infidel skin. Basically he has what is colloquially known as “extreme eczema,” but basically it seems that his skin is attempting to hijack his body and run it into a building. So with that in mind, he went to get himself checked out. During his check out, the doctor was like “OMG. Yours skin is at terror alert red.
